00094       void dump( ostream& cerr ) const {
00095          cerr << "   featureType " << int(m_featureType) << endl
00096               << "   highScaleLevel " << m_highScaleLevel << endl
00097               << "   lowScaleLevel " << m_lowScaleLevel << endl
00098               << "   onMap " << m_onMap << endl
00099               << "   borderOnMap " << m_borderOnMap << endl
00100               << "   textOnMap " << m_textOnMap << endl
00101               << "   drawStyle " << int(m_drawStyle) << endl
00102               << "   drawSymbol " << int(m_drawSymbol) << endl
00103               << "   lineWidth " << m_lineWidth << endl
00104               << "   drawColor " << int( m_drawColor ) << endl
00105               << "   borderLineWidth " << m_borderLineWidth << endl
00106               << "   borderColor " << int( m_borderColor ) << endl
00107               << "   fontSize " << m_fontSize << endl
00108               << "   fontColor " << int(m_fontColor) << endl
00109               << "   fontName " << m_fontName << endl;
00110       }
00111             
00112       // private: no! not private public so we can use . operator.
00113       GfxFeature::gfxFeatureType m_featureType;
00114       uint32 m_highScaleLevel;
00115       uint32 m_lowScaleLevel;
00116       bool m_onMap;

00135 
00136 inline uint32 
00137 MapSetting::getSize() const {
00138    // Comment lines and return lines match
00139    // featureType,highScaleLevel,lowScaleLevel,onMap,borderOnMap,
00140    // textOnMap,drawStyle,drawSymbol,lineWidth,drawColor,borderColor,
00141    // borderLineWidth,fontSize,fontColor,fontName + possible padding
00142    return 2+1+1+1+1+
00143       1+1+1+1+2+2+
00144       1+1+2+strlen( m_fontName ) + 1 + 3;
00145 }
